info.title: Athleon API
info.description:
Comprehensive API Documentation for Athleon E-Commerce. 

**Authentication**: Bearer Token (JWT).
**Base URL**: `/api`

**Standard Response Format (v2.0)**:
```json
{
  "status_code": 200,
  "message": "Success message",
  "data": { ... }
}
```

**Postman Variables**:
- `{{BASE_URL}}`: http://localhost:8000/api
- `{{bearerAuth}}`: Your JWT token from login response
